attachments.title: PCQM: A full-reference quality metric for colored 3D point clouds
attachments.citation: Meynet, G., Nehme, Y., Digne, J., & Lavoue, G. (2020). PCQM: A full-reference quality metric for colored 3D point clouds. 2020 Twelfth International Conference on Quality of Multimedia Experience (QoMEX), 1–6. https://doi.org/10.1109/QoMEX48832.2020.9123147

attachments.title: A comprehensive study and comparison of core technologies for MPEG 3-D point cloud compression
attachments.citation: Liu, H., Yuan, H., Liu, Q., Hou, J., & Liu, J. (2020). A comprehensive study and comparison of core technologies for MPEG 3-D point cloud compression. IEEE Transactions on Broadcasting, 66(3), 701–717. https://doi.org/10.1109/TBC.2019.2957652

attachments.title: 3D Point Cloud Attribute Compression Using Geometry-Guided Sparse Representation
attachments.citation: Gu, S., Hou, J., Zeng, H., Yuan, H., & Ma, K.-K. (2020). 3D Point Cloud Attribute Compression Using Geometry-Guided Sparse Representation. IEEE Transactions on Image Processing, 29, 796–808. https://doi.org/10.1109/TIP.2019.2936738

attachments.title: An overview of ongoing point cloud compression standardization activities: video-based (V-PCC) and geometry-based (G-PCC)
attachments.citation: Graziosi, D. B., Nakagami, O., Kuma, S., Zaghetto, A., Suzuki, T., & Tabatabai, A. (2020). An overview of ongoing point cloud compression standardization activities: Video-based (V-PCC) and geometry-based (G-PCC). APSIPA Transactions on Signal and Information Processing, 9(1). https://doi.org/10.1017/atsip.2020.12

attachments.title: Emerging MPEG standards for point cloud compression
attachments.citation: Schwarz, S., Preda, M., Baroncini, V., Budagavi, M., Cesar, P., Chou, P. A., Cohen, R. A., Krivokuca, M., Lasserre, S., Li, Z., Llach, J., Mammou, K., Mekuria, R., Nakagami, O., Siahaan, E., Tabatabai, A., Tourapis, A. M., & Zakharchenko, V. (2019). Emerging MPEG standards for point cloud compression. IEEE Journal on Emerging and Selected Topics in Circuits and Systems, 9(1), 133–148. https://doi.org/10.1109/JETCAS.2018.2885981

attachments.title: 3D point cloud compression: A survey
attachments.citation: Cao, C., Preda, M., & Zaharia, T. (2019). 3D point cloud compression: A survey. Proceedings of the 24th International Conference on 3D Web Technology, 1–9. https://doi.org/10.1145/3329714.3338130

attachments.title: A comprehensive study of the rate-distortion performance in MPEG point cloud compression
attachments.citation: Alexiou, E., Viola, I., Borges, T. M., Fonseca, T. A., De Queiroz, R. L., & Ebrahimi, T. (2019). A comprehensive study of the rate-distortion performance in MPEG point cloud compression. APSIPA Transactions on Signal and Information Processing, 8(1), e27. https://doi.org/10.1017/ATSIP.2019.20

prompt:
Now, Listen to me:
基于对书中主题和讨论的理解, 请从原文提取不同有利的方法或证据回答一下问题：概述## 2.3 LoD(多层次细节)与运动补偿  
• LoD技术在实时传输和自适应显示中的关键作用  
• 运动补偿算法在时间序列点云编码中的应用

Your answer should be in Chinese, using the Markdown format for layout.
The instructions for the attachments uploaded:
- PCQM: A full-reference quality metric for colored 3D point clouds, was published on 2020. (It can be cite this paper as Meynet et al., 2020 on your answer). 
- A comprehensive study and comparison of core technologies for MPEG 3-D point cloud compression, was published on 2020. (It can be cite this paper as Liu et al., 2020 on your answer). 
- 3D Point Cloud Attribute Compression Using Geometry-Guided Sparse Representation, was published on 2020. (It can be cite this paper as Gu et al., 2020 on your answer). 
- An overview of ongoing point cloud compression standardization activities: video-based (V-PCC) and geometry-based (G-PCC), was published on 2020. (It can be cite this paper as Graziosi et al., 2020 on your answer). 
- Emerging MPEG standards for point cloud compression, was published on 2019. This paper serves as the dominant theoretical frameworks for all subsequent papers included in the appendix. (It can be cite this paper as Schwarz et al., 2019 on your answer). 
- 3D point cloud compression: A survey, was published on 2019. (It can be cite this paper as Cao et al., 2019 on your answer). 
- A comprehensive study of the rate-distortion performance in MPEG point cloud compression, was published on 2019. (It can be cite this paper as Alexiou et al., 2019 on your answer).
response: 你和 Kimi 的对话超过 20 万字了，开启一个新会话可以接着聊。
quection:
